mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( board_seq, file_seq, board_type, user_id, originalFilename, filepath, filesize ) VALUES ( #{boardSeq}, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(file_seq),0) +1 FROM file f WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND board_type = 'f' ), 'f', #{userId}, #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )
